name: 4th Edition of World Congress on GEOLOGY&EARTHSCIENCE
content: GeoEarth-2023 serve to unite and engage people passionate about geoscience and its role in addressing global challenges. We do this through various and exciting programme of thematic events which reflect our principle areas of focus. Through our conference, we aim to improve knowledge and understanding of the future of Geology and Earth Science. At this international high-level policy event, GeoEarth-2023 invites leaders from across society to meet and discuss policies and experiences. The Third edition of Geology and Earth Science was completed successfully (Virtually) with over 70 participants and the previous in-person event had 96 attendee from 37 countries attended in Barcelona Spain and the event has a growing interest among the scientists and technicians.
